text.tspan: Economic damage by natural disaster type, 1900 to 2024
Global economic damage from natural disasters, differentiated by disaster category and measured in US$ per

g.text: Glacial lake outburst flood Glacial lake outburst flood
Dry mass movement Dry mass movement

text.tspan: Note: Data includes disasters recorded up to April 2024.
